servinfo.title: Headlights are not turned ON or OFF automatically even after darkened or lightened

item.ptxt: Use of SUZUKI scan tool makes it easy to check whether a faulty condition is on the input side or output side of BCM. For checking procedure, refer to “Diagnosis Using Output Test Function of SUZUKI Scan Tool” under Scan Tool Data .
Check each part in the order from the top of the following list.

condition.ptxt: Headlights are not turned ON or OFF automatically even after darkened or lightened

action.ptxt: Replace fuse and check for short circuit.
Check parking brake switch referring to Parking Brake Switch Inspection .
Check lighting and dimmer switch referring to Headlight Switch (in Lighting Switch) Inspection .
Check auto-on headlight sensor referring to Auto-On Headlight Sensor Inspection (If Equipped) .
Check BCM for function referring to Inspection of BCM and Its Circuits .
